alert.note: Alert for Mason (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 5:02PM CDT until June 16 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MASON COUNTY... At 501 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was in extreme southeastern Mason County, and was located over Us-87 Near The Mason-Gillespie County Line, or over Cherry Spring, and moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. This storm also has frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Mason County, including the following locations... Us- 87 Near The Mason-Gillespie County Line. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
